title: 이달의소녀탐구 #493 (LOONA TV #493)
summary:
0:01 -- The 'Up' unit (the tall ones) have their photoshoot.
0:16 -- Yves: "We are too tall. The ceiling isn't low at all" as she stands at the smallest area and Hyejoo looks embarrased. YvLip force her to laugh at the joke. After a while, she joins in as well.
0:31 -- YeoJin flexes her shortness "I can hide anywhere cause I'm small~.... I'm so jealous of you".
0:45 -- The 'Line' Unit (the shorter ones) have their photoshoot.
